news_items.content: Here is a rewritten version of the text with improved clarity and concision:
Chennai News Today: Find Chennai latest news and headlines on weather updates, entertainment politics, schools, crime, festivals and real estate.
Heavy rains caused road congestion in Chennai, but efforts to improve infrastructure are underway.
International Toilet Festival 3.0 kicks off, promoting sanitation and hygiene awareness worldwide.
Four persons arrested for attempting to smuggle cocaine worth Rs 6 crore into Chennai.
Two Madras High Court judges resign amid controversy surrounding the handling of a high-profile case.
Chennai College Students Drown in River
Three students drowned while swimming in Coimbatore's river, sparking concern over water safety.
Ram Darbar Pran Pratishtha in Ayodhya: A Hindu festival that brings people together.
RCB Shredded After Stampede Claims 11 Lives: "Any team is capable of winning," the coach said.
BJP Leader Insists Their Party Has the Capabilities to Handle Any Responsibility.
"Greener Spaces in Bastar as Forest Cover Increases": This initiative aims to preserve India's natural beauty.
Congress MP Calls for a Probe into Scandal Over AI-Powered Polling System.
Vijay Accuses Police of Assault on TVK Worker at Chennai Fire Site, Leaving Her Dead.
Bihar CM Chirag Paswan Wants to Become the New Chief Minister in Bihar.
Trump Announces Travel Ban Affecting Dozen Countries, Including Afghanistan and Iran.
RCB Victory Celebrations Turn Tragic After 11 Lives Lost in Stampede.
Gen Chauhan's Red Lines on Terrorism Sparks Debate.
